title: What should I study for a business? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business doesn't require any special course or studies. Business is an art. Only 37% of the Population has mastered the art of Business. You can say that this 37% are dumb, absolutely dumb in studies but are master in making contacts, influencing people, grasping their mind. Business is all about publicity. The more people know you the more people buy your stuff. If you create contacts around your locality, your business would be praised. Business is mustered by Experience. The experience opens up the path to success. Business requires an immense knowledge of the society. Every dislikes, likes, stuff that people hate/ love, types of people they love/ hate etc. You have to survive in a market where people would backstab you but you have to stand still and face the society. If you be kind, the society would be kind making the Business run smooth. So, if you think you are among the 37% then prepare yourself to enter a market where there is no exit.

For doing any business…your soft skills and real life skills is much much more valuable than any theoretical knowledge.. although you should have some basic knowledge of theoretical business…you should go and study for relationship building with anyone and study for building a charming personality..and uopn your management skills …there are lots of other things needed for learning to any businesses but these above mentioned things are mandatory.
